lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: In a state of altered power, we begin these games within the tower

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Ah! I see you have awoken, Adara

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Who are you? How do you know my name?

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Where am I?

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: So many questions, so few answers.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: You may call me Castellan.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Well, I should take my leave. Goodbye for now...

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Well, I should probably try and get out of here.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Wherever here is...

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Adara!

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Altair? This 'being' brought you here too?

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: If by being you mean the disembodied voice that calls himself Castellan then yes.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: I am curious as to what he wants from us but I'd prefer to not stick around long enough to find out.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Magical floating orbs?

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: I wonder if they can help us open the door and get out of here..

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: I don't think we have any other options, let's give it a try.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Magical... orbs?

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: They might be able to help us open the door and escape

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: I hope so. The one on my side looks a bit different.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Wow! What's happening it's following me...

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Are you ok? What's it doing?

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: I seem to be able to control it...

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: And I feel weightless...

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: I'm flying!?

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: I can control this orb!

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Hmmm.. It pulls stuff towards it.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: I can definitely do something with this.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: The stairs are broken. I guess I could try to fly up instead.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Does this other orb fit into the 'circuit' on the wall?

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Might as well give it a try.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: This place is massive.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: So cool.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Over there! That looks like the door!

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Thank goodness! We're free.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Hang on a second there is somthing wrong we can't go through.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: You thought it would be that easy?

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Don't worry this is just the beginning.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: You again. Let us out!

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: But why would you want to leave, we are having so much fun!

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Please let us out. What did we do to deserve this?

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Well come on up. There is so much more fun in store.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: What? No, come back!

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Adara, we are going to have to do what he says for now...

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: We should try to combine the abilities from both of our orbs to lift this pillar.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Another room?

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Awww, are you having fun yet?

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Very much no.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: If you're not going to help, leave us be.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: **laughs

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Is that the orb from before? Hmmm, but it's gone dark...

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: It looks like that energy fades when it touches something.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: That orb in the cart was holding the energy pretty well before.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: You move the cart I'll hold up the energy.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Huh... The orb let out all it's energy when it touched my field.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Maybe your field disabling gravity stops the orb from...

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: I don't care how it works, just keep that orb out of my field while it's powered.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: We need to fix the rail.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: I can lift the lever but you need to hold it up while I move the cart.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Ok, ok I got it.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: There we go. The orb  is gone and the door is open.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Sounds like you're having fun.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: How many rooms are there?

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Enough.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: And how many is that?

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: And he's gone

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Well, let's get to it. There's that orb again.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: When my field touches the powered orbs, it releases it's energy.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Well, I wonder if that energy will overload the doors.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: That's an idea. Let's try it.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Maybe if we blast the gate with the charge then hold it open, we can blast the door as well

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: On it.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Well, that's done

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Why do I remember doing this exact thing before?

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Yeah, that's some crazy Déjà vu... Weird.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: This room seems vaguely familiar as well...

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: I agree...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Ah, you've finally made it.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: It's good to see you both again face to face.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: And you brought me my orb! I haven't needed it for a while but I appreciate the gesture.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Though this energy is delicious.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: So I'm going to enjoy this orb and you can try and stop me.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Aaaah let me down

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Nooo, that power is mine!

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: He's getting weaker. Keep it up!

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Yeah! We got this.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: How do you like that.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: This is not how it's supposed to get back

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: You started this, we are going to finish it.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Wait?

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Caelum?

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Caelum...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: I see you both remember now...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: First of all, thank you for bringing me back to my senses

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Second, I'm sorry now you see what our wish cost.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Caelum, we didn't mean for this to happen.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: We had no idea what the cost of such a wish would be...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Even if I knew I wouldn't do anything different... Except maybe be a bit nicer to you guys.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: And now is my time to go... You are now free.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Goodbye my friends. Go enjoy the life we fought for.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Goodbye Caelum... We'll not waste any second of it.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Goodbye dear friend. Your sacrifice will not be in vain.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: In search of a wish to save those they hold dear,

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: They heard of a place that could fix what they fear.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: They reached the tower, not knowing what was in store.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: If they had, the three friends might have never stepped through the door...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Upon entering the tower gifts where bestowed,

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: One unto each, their new abilities they must decode.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: A fallen pillar or two, mistakes they did make.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Unbeknownst to them, something else was about to break...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Reaching the next room in this twisted tower,

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: The three friends thought they had a hold on their power.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: But what they were holding had a hold on one of them...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: The scorches outside reflecting the burns within.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Room after room, they searched in vain.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: For Caelum, this power started turning into pain...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: It surged through his veins and entered his heart,

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Until his friends could no longer tell him and the power apart.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: The power overtook him, now no longer a man.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: He became something beyond what the two of you could understand.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Their wish had been granted, their loved ones were saved

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: But only because the tower was satisfied with what Caelum gave...
